field.name: organizationPartyId
field.description: The internal organization Party that owns (or rather, is liable for) the account.

field.name: ownerPartyId
field.description: The customer or third party that owns the account.

field.name: fromDate
field.description: Describes when account will be valid. If null, valid immediately.

field.name: thruDate
field.description: Expiration date of the account. If null, will never expire.

field.name: actualBalance
field.description: Calculated as the sum of FinAccountTrans.amount

field.name: availableBalance
field.description: Calculated as actualBalance minus sum of outstanding FinAccountAuth.amount

field.name: orderItemSeqId
field.description: To be used along with orderId to point to an OrderItem that represents the purchase of a product to add money to the account.

field.name: productMaintTypeId
field.description: If productMaintSeqId is known can lookup using that and the FixedAsset.productId; for un-scheduled maintenance is filled in directly

field.name: productMaintSeqId
field.description: Optional, though should be filled in to determine upcoming maintenance for all scheduled maintenance

field.name: scheduleWorkEffortId
field.description: Has field for estimated/actual start and finish dates, etc

field.name: intervalUomId
field.description: UOM for intervalQuantity; if used intervalMeterTypeId is generally not used (ie one or the other); if a meter reading is done as well that is not tied to the interval it should be tracked in a FixedAssetMeter record

field.name: intervalMeterTypeId
field.description: Meter Type for intervalQuantity; if used intervalUomId is generally not used (ie one or the other)

field.name: fixedAssetTypeId
field.description: The fixed asset type for the mappings. This field can be set to _NA_ in order to define a mapping for all types or for a specific asset (specified by the id in the fixedAssetId field).

field.name: fixedAssetId
field.description: The fixed asset id for the mappings. This field can be set to _NA_ in order to define a mapping for all assets of a given type (specified by the id in the fixedAssetTypeId field).

field.name: assetGlAccountId
field.description: The (debit) account for the initial asset value (purchase cost)

field.name: accDepGlAccountId
field.description: The (credit) account for the accumulated depreciation

field.name: depGlAccountId
field.description: The (debit) account for the depreciation expense (matches the accDepGlAccountId)

field.name: profitGlAccountId
field.description: The (credit) account for the eventual profit derived from the sale of the asset

field.name: lossGlAccountId
field.description: The (debit) account for the eventual loss derived from the sale of the asset

field.name: externalId
field.description: This field stores invoice ID of the external system

field.name: overrideGlAccountId
field.description: used to specify the override or actual glAccountId used for the invoice, avoids problems if configuration changes after initial posting, etc

field.name: overrideOrgPartyId
field.description: Used to specify the organization override rather than using the payToPartyId

field.name: externalId
field.description: id of the account in an external system where the accounts are imported/exported

field.name: errorGlJournalId
field.description: Journal to which all the failed automatic transaction are assigned. If the error journal is set, if the GL posting fails for some reason the triggering operation (finalizing an invoice or payment or whatever) would NOT roll back, instead the partial GL post would be placed into the error journal.

entity.description: Running tally of a product's average cost in a particular company and facility

field.name: validFromDate
field.description: Not common in some parts of the world.

field.name: issueNumber
field.description: Single digit number on some Switch and Maestro cards

field.name: overrideGlAccountId
field.description: If filled in, payment is applied directly against this GL account

field.name: apiVersion
field.description: Target Authorize Dot Net API version

field.name: delimiterChar
field.description: Delimited Character - the delimiter to use in the response

field.name: method
field.description: Method - CC for credit card processing

field.name: emailCustomer
field.description: Email Customer? - if should send an email to the customer for each transaction (TRUE|FALSE)

field.name: emailMerchant
field.description: Email Merchant? - if should send email to the merchant for each transaction (TRUE|FALSE)

field.name: testMode
field.description: Test Mode - forces the url property to the test url and adds more logging info to the logs (TRUE|FALSE)

field.name: relayResponse
field.description: Relay Response? - if should relay the reposnse to a different server (TRUE|FALSE)

field.name: duplicateWindow
field.description: Check the duplicate transaction in the specified time duration which is specified in seconds. If duplicate transaction occurs in the defined time limit then return error.

field.name: keysDir
field.description: Directory of the keys from CyberSource (Generate using online tools)

field.name: keysFile
field.description: Name of the keystore (if different then "merchantID".p12)

field.name: merchantDescr
field.description: Merchant Description - Shown on credit card statement

field.name: merchantContact
field.description: Merchant Description Contact Information - Shown on credit card statement

field.name: enableDav
field.description: Use DAV In Authorization -- May not be supported any longer

field.name: fraudScore
field.description: Use Fraud Scoring In Authorization -- May not be supported any longer

field.name: disableBillAvs
field.description: Disable AVS for Capture -- May not be supported any longer

field.name: avsDeclineCodes
field.description: AVS Decline Codes -- May not be supported any longer

field.name: preAuth
field.description: Pre-Authorize Payments (if set to N will auto-capture)

field.name: enableTransmit
field.description: Set to false to not transmit anything

field.name: cancelReturnUrl
field.description: Express Checkout Return On Cancel URL

field.name: apiEnvironment
field.description: PayPal API Environment (valid values are: live, sandbox or beta-sandbox)

field.name: imageUrl
field.description: Image URL to use on PayPal

field.name: confirmTemplate
field.description: Thank-You / Confirm Order Template (rendered via Freemarker)

field.name: confirmUrl
field.description: PayPal Confirm URL Sandbox/Production (JSSE must be configured to use SSL)

field.name: shippingCallbackUrl
field.description: Specific to Express Checkout which performs callbacks to our server to retrieve shipping estimates

field.name: requireConfirmedShipping
field.description: Indicates that you require that the customers shipping address on file with PayPal be a confirmed address.

field.name: processMode
field.description: Process mode (Y: approve / N: decline / R: random / P: production)

field.name: serverURL
field.description: Server URL of the payment processor

field.name: enableCVM
field.description: Enable Card Verification Methods (CID, CVC, CVV2)

field.name: fixContact
field.description: Will displace contact info on WorldPay in non-editable format

field.name: hideContact
field.description: Will hide the contact info completely

field.name: hideCurrency
field.description: This causes the currency drop down to be no hidden, so fixing the currency that the shopper must value purchase in

field.name: langId
field.description: The shopper's language choice, as a 2-character ISO 639 code, with optional regionalisation using 2-character country code separated by hyphen

field.name: noLanguageMenu
field.description: This suppresses the display of the language menu if noLanguageMenu no you have a choice of languages enabled for your value installation

field.name: withDelivery
field.description: Displays input fields for delivery address and withDelivery no mandate that they be filled in

field.name: testMode
field.description: Test Mode (100: approve / 101: cancelled / 0: Live Mode (no test)

field.name: engineClass
field.description: Class for the Orbital Gateway - Default should be used - HttpsEngine

field.name: hostNameFailover
field.description: Failover Address of the payment processor

field.name: portFailover
field.description: Failover Port of the payment processor

field.name: serverURL
field.description: Server URL of the payment processor

field.name: enableAmountRound
field.description: Enable rounds the currency amount to .00 (Y / N)

field.name: merchantId
field.description: The ID of the webshop, received by the acceptor during the registration process

field.name: merchantSubId
field.description: SubID of the webshop, default value = 0 (zero); only to be changed in consultation with the acquirer

field.name: merchantReturnURL
field.description: URL of the page in the webshop to which the consumer is redirected after an iDEAL transaction. This value can be overruled as necessary in the webshop implementation

field.name: acquirerURL
field.description: URL of the acceptors acquirer; the following prescribed values apply to ING

field.name: acquirerTimeout
field.description: Number of seconds (default = 10) of waiting time for a response from the iDEAL services. If no response is received during that time, an exception is displayed

field.name: privateCert
field.description: Name of the acceptors organization as given during the creation of his or her own certificate. See section 0 for more information about the acceptors certificate

field.name: fromDate
field.description: Describes when a rate amount will be valid. If null, valid immediately.

field.name: thruDate
field.description: Describes when a rate amount will be valid untl. If null, valid indefinitly.

field.name: percentageUsed
field.description: The percentage of the actual hours registered in timeEntries, used for the task and invoice actuals, if the field is null 100% will be used
